title: An optimization model-based DEA-MARCOS approach for assessing EU countries towards achieving sustainable development goals
content:
Publication date: December 2024

Source: Environmental Science & Policy, Volume 162

Author(s): Abhijit Saha, Arunodaya Raj Mishra, Pratibha Rani, Muhammet Deveci, Bijoy Krishna Debnath, Norziana Jamil, Moamin A. Mahmoud
